name: Reinforcement Learning

name: Transfer Learning
description: Apply knowledge gained from one problem to a different but related problem, improving the efficiency of machine learning models.

name: Dimensionality Reduction
description: Reduce the number of random variables under consideration, simplifying models and speeding up machine learning algorithms.
